verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w called|strong="G2822"\w* \add to be\add* an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sosthenes|strong="G4988"\w* \add our\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*,

Unto the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*, to them that are \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w called|strong="G2822"\w* \add to be\add* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* call \w upon|strong="G1941"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w theirs|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ours|strong="G2257"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w on|strong="G4012"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w behalf|strong="G4012"\w*, \w for|strong="G1909"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* ye are \w enriched|strong="G4148"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w utterance|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*;
Even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* was \w confirmed|strong="G0950"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*:

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* come \w behind|strong="G5302"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w gift|strong="G5486"\w*; waiting \w for|strong="G0553"\w* the \w coming|strong="G0602"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

Who \w shall|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w confirm|strong="G0950"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*, \add that ye may be\add* \w blameless|strong="G0410"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye were \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G3004"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* the same \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* there \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w divisions|strong="G4978"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add that\add* ye \w be|strong="G5600"\w* perfectly joined \w together|strong="G2675"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w judgment|strong="G1106"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it hath been \w declared|strong="G1213"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \add which are of the house\add* of \w Chloe|strong="G5514"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w contentions|strong="G2054"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* of \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* of \w Cephas|strong="G2786"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Is|strong="G3307"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w divided|strong="G3307"\w*? \w was|strong="G4717"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* were ye \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*?

I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w Crispus|strong="G2921"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gaius|strong="G1050"\w*;

\w Lest|strong="G2443"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* should \w say|strong="G2036"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I had \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* mine \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w household|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Stephanas|strong="G4734"\w*: \w besides|strong="G3063"\w*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* I \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w baptize|strong="G0907"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*: \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* should be made of none \w effect|strong="G2758"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w preaching|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* to \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w perish|strong="G0622"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* which are \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, I will \w destroy|strong="G0622"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will bring to \w nothing|strong="G0114"\w* the \w understanding|strong="G4907"\w* of the \w prudent|strong="G4908"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \add is\add* the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*? \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \add is\add* the \w scribe|strong="G1122"\w*? \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \add is\add* the \w disputer|strong="G4804"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*? hath \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* made \w foolish|strong="G3471"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* after \w that|strong="G1894"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, it \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w* of \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* to \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1894"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w require|strong="G0154"\w* a \w sign|strong="G4592"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* after \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, unto the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* a \w stumblingblock|strong="G4625"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* unto the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w called|strong="G2822"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w foolishness|strong="G3474"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w wiser|strong="G4680"\w* than \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w weakness|strong="G0772"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w stronger|strong="G2478"\w* than \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* wise \w men|strong="G4680"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w noble|strong="G2104"\w*, \add are called\add*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* the foolish \w things|strong="G3474"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w confound|strong="G2617"\w* the \w wise|strong="G4680"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w* the weak \w things|strong="G0772"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w confound|strong="G2617"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w mighty|strong="G2478"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* base \w things|strong="G0036"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which are \w despised|strong="G1848"\w*, \w hath|strong="G1586"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w*, \add yea\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* bring to \w nought|strong="G2673"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* that \w are|strong="G5607"\w*:
\w That|strong="G3704"\w* \w no|strong="G3956"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* should \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1799"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w presence|strong="G1799"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w made|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w*, according \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w He|strong="G3588"\w* that \w glorieth|strong="G2744"\w*, let him \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
